Good morning and happy Monday! Our last day in Barcelona today (and meeting Lore @datesandavocados & @ilkkasalo ğŸ‰ğŸ˜) so will be finding yet more amazing food to eat ğŸ¤— - honestly I'm so inspired by the food here it just amazes me.

Love & hugs to all. Niki xx

Good morning from (will be) sunny Barcelona!! Not sure what we'll be having for breakfast yet ğŸ˜œ but here's some absolutely yummy protein pancakes for you...thank you to my friends @nutristrength for sending me their delicious vanilla protein powder! ğŸ™ˆ
They're super simple to make (1/2 cup buckwheat flour, 1 scoop @nutristrength vanilla protein powder, 1 tsp cinnamon, handful sliced  blueberries & 1 cup of water or almond milk) - Mix and spoon onto a frying pan - when they bubble - flip! 
I topped with coconut yogurt & toasted almonds. Very very tasty guys! ğŸ˜
I hope you have a lovely Sunday, we'll be exploring and mostly eating - I'll pop some stuff in stories later! ğŸ˜œ
Love Niki xx

Good morning! ğŸ’— Did you see the amazing @adobephotography competition? I'm super excited to be teaming up with @adobecreativecloud again. This time to host a competition where you can win a food photography kit worth Â£2000 and a full years subscription to Creative Cloud Photography.

I honestly could spend hrs on @lightroom everyday and I use it to edit all my pics so head on over to the link in my bio for more info and a chance to win. #sponsored #adobephotography

And scroll through to see my before and after pics. What do you think?? Good luck guys!! ğŸ˜
#foodphoto #breakfast #foodphotography #foodstyling #pink #eatmoreplants

It's all about balance right? I've been craving lots of crunchy veg since I got back (post holiday indulgences) so today's lunch - colourful cabbage salad, tomatoes, & tofu with sesame fried broccoli, a tahini & apple cider vinegar dressing and toasted seeds. Fresh and delicious! 
However, also I've been making a cake for a special project - so I had to try it?? ğŸ™ˆğŸ¤—
#salad #raw #lunch #eatmoreplants #letscookvegan #foodstyling #foodphotography

Hey! ğŸ’— I'm back home after an amazing week in the Caribbean - so many wonderful experiences and met some super inspiring people. Thank you again @thomsoncruises ğŸ˜
Andy has been busy with a big garden project while I was away ğŸ˜œ but he's now in Spain so it's just me and my cats this week. 
Of course the cupboard was bare, so spicy beans on toast it had to be ğŸ˜œ
Can't wait to catch up on everything I've missed now! ğŸ˜ğŸ¤—
Love, Niki xx
